body:
How can this be?  These two modules (probably) have the same hash code, wouldn't they be the same file then?

```
$ module avail 2>&1 | grep modele-control
linux-SuSE11-x86_64/modele-control-develop-gcc-5.3.0-m5n4oux
linux-SuSE11-x86_64/modele-control-develop-gcc-5.3.0-m5n4oux
```
title: The same module installed twice?
